name: @aavenluutn/contracts
description: Story collection publishing and auction contracts
author: Emblem Studio

scripts.deploy:mumbai: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mumbai
scripts.deploy:ropsten: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network ropsten
scripts.deploy:goerli: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network goerli
scripts.deploy:dev: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/deploy_dev.js --network goerli
scripts.updateBaseURI:goerli: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat  --network goerli updateBaseURI
scripts.new-narrator:ropsten: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/newNarrator.js --network ropsten
scripts.new-narrator:goerli: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/newNarrator.js --network goerli
scripts.new-narrator:goerli-dev: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/newNarrator_dev.js --network goerli
scripts.new-narrator:mumbai: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/newNarrator.js --network mumbai
scripts.new-narrator:polygon: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/newNarrator.js --network polygon
scripts.build: npx hardhat compile && yarn get-abi && yarn get-bin
scripts.verify:polygon: REPORT_GAS=true PRIVATE_KEY=`keybase fs read /keybase/team/squad_games/squad\ test\ PK.txt` npx hardhat run scripts/verify.js --network polygon
